name: Spectral
description:
Ever wish for a party game that has a bunch of different modes, objectives, maps, and challenges all in one?

Wish Granted!

Spectral is a platform fighter with quick levels, games, and objectives. Reach the max score before your foes!


Key Features
Online play for up to 4 players
Unique game flow, strategic control
Levels with different features
Build and share custom levels(Coming soon)
Compete for global best times on Challenge levels across all platforms
Customizable rule sets and game modes
Play as a handful of different characters
Fun, cartoony art style
